info.title: Create a Group
info.description:
Creates a new group in your Fivetran account. 

> IMPORTANT: Groups and destinations are mapped 1:1 to each other. We do this mapping using the group's `id` value that we automatically generate when you create a group, and the destination's `group_id` value that you specify when you create a destination. This means that you must create a group in your Fivetran account before you can create a destination in it.
